definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: They were at the stationer's on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 他們星期天在文具店裏。

sentences.english: We're opening a new book and stationery shop.
sentences.chinese: 我們開了一家新的書店和文具店。

sentences.english: Buy me some paper and a pen at the stationer's when you are out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去的時候幫我在文具店裏買些紙再加一支鋼筆。

sentences.english: She bought a packet of envelops at the stationery store.
sentences.chinese: 她在文具店買了一捆信封。

sentences.english: When were Sam and Peney at the stationer's?
sentences.chinese: 薩姆和彭妮什麼時候去文具店的？

sentences.english: You can buy ready-printed forms for wills at stationery shops.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在文具店買到已印好的遺囑單。

sentences.english: I now opened a small stationer's shop.
sentences.chinese: 我現在開了一間小小的文具店。

sentences.english: I went into a stationer's to buy a ruler.
sentences.chinese: 我走進文具店去買一把尺子。

sentences.english: Pop along to the stationer's and get me some envelopes.
sentences.chinese: 趕快到文具店去一下，給我買幾個信封來。

sentences.english: They were at the stationer's on Monday.
That's why "New Store" Stationery Store was built up!
sentences.chinese: 就這樣，一家新開的文具店在橫山鄉開張了。

sentences.english: Only in China do stationery shops have rows of "For my Teacher" cards on sale twelve months of the year.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，文具店裏的敬師卡一年到頭都暢銷。

sentences.english: There are many stationery shops and publishing house business department here.
sentences.chinese: 許多文具店和出版社商業部門也在這裏落腳。

sentences.english: Have the children to look at the picture, tell them that they are in a stationery store.
sentences.chinese: 教師告訴學生他們在一個文具店中。

sentences.english: Herbet bought a notebook at the stationery store.
sentences.chinese: 赫伯特在文具店買了一本筆記本。

definition: kiosk/snack counter/retail department or section inside a larger business
stationery/item of stationery (pen, pencil, eraser, pencil sharpener etc)
supermarket/abbr. for 超級市場|超级市场/CL:家[jia1]
Xinhua Bookstore, China's largest bookstore chain
